summary: This mod reintroduces seven all-female, all-Nord followers back into Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Nordic Beauties of Skyrim

[/size][/color][/font][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]This mod reintroduces seven all-female, all-Nord followers into Skyrim; Brynhildr, Eir, Geirdriful, Herfjotur, Hladgudr, Olrun, and Randgrid. They can all be found within the Worker's house at Mixwater Mill. 

[/color][/font][/size][i][size=4]*Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested! [/size][/i][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]


[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work.
[/color][/font][/size][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]All Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique Voices [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Each individual fighting style [/size][/color][/font]
[/list]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to [/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies [/url]﻿& Stealthic for KS Hairdo's Renewal[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]LogRaam[/url]﻿ for The Eyes of Beauty [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/]Cloudedtruth[/url]﻿ for Relationship Dialogue Overhaul [/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Mods I'm using [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=4]The following mods are used in these screenshots, however are not included in the mod itself (besides one sword & and one outfit from the Witcher mods), and come highly recommended. 

[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Facelight[/url]﻿ by Tktk1[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]﻿ by Dheuster[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/]Better Females[/url]﻿ by Bella[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70]Nude Females[/url]﻿ by Thepal[/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
